column5: VLRX POS profit takers and day traders making a whopping 30 cents Pathetic This is a buy and hold

VLRX JohnnyMaJun 3rd 1026 am waiting for the short squeeze b4 though did u see the short float on thisShort squeeze is a complete myth See attached chart The day SP went up 5 the short volume went up to 31 But the following days short volume went down accordingly to around 20 I think there will be more shorts when the ATM offer is announced The ATM offer price can be as low as 2 just my speculation based on previous VLRXs offerings WAIT for ATM offer b4 BUY so one can have the reasonable entry point GLTA Longs
VLRX so much possible upside just chillin till the volume comes in

VLRX iwanderer why do you have such a hardon to short VLRX a company that improved insulin delivery for diabetics If you want to short so bad go short BA that is getting in trouble right now for not disclosing a deadly software glitch on their Boeing 737 MAX 8 that keeps crashing
